title: Armed gang member jailed 9 years for robbery at funeral parlour
desc: A BULAWAYO man, who was part of a gang, has been sentenced to an effective nine-year prison term for orchestrating an armed robbery at a funeral parlour in the city. Clifford Desmond Nare (34) of Cowdray Park, Bulawayo, appeared at Tredgold Magistrates Court facing a count of robbery and was convicted after full trial. The […]

title: Two passengers killed after being tossed off truck, crash onto tarmac
desc: TWO passengers aboard an Isuzu KB300 truck that veered off the road died after crushing onto the tarmac having been thrown out of the loading box. The fatal accident occurred along the Ngundu-Tanganda road Thursday. Zimbabwe Republic Police (ZRP) national spokesperson, Commissioner Paul Nyathi confirmed the incident. “The ZRP confirms a fatal road traffic accident […]
